author: Brian Turner
method: Heat the oil and butter in a pan and gently fry the broccoli and ginger for 3-4 minutes, or until the broccoli is tender. Add the cooked rice and fry for a further 3-4 minutes, then stir in the dill.  Spoon the fried rice onto a plate and serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 tbsp vegetable oil,  knob butter,  55g/2oz broccoli, chopped,  1 tsp freshly grated root ginger,  85g/3oz basmati rice, cooked and drained,  2 tbsp chopped fresh dill
